mapper.insert: INSERT Member (id, password, nickName, email) VALUES (#{id}, hex(aes_encrypt(#{password}, "dundung")), #{nickName}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Member WHERE id = #{id} AND #{password} = (SELECT CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(password), 'dundung') AS CHAR(200)) FROM Member WHERE id=#{id})
SELECT * FROM Member WHERE id = #{id} AND email = #{email}
